title: How to Make a Nutrient Rich Salad

steps.headline: Choose vegetables to add to your salad.
steps.description: The following are main vegetables often found in salads: tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, peppers, lettuce, onions, arugula.

steps.headline: Decide whether you would like to add optional healthy choices.
steps.description: These include parsley, olives, broccoli and corn. You can also add boiled eggs, grilled chicken or tuna.

steps.headline: Cut all of your vegetables in slices, whatever size you want.
Add a homemade dressing.
Decide how much dressing you would like to add to the salad.
steps.description: Ensure that you do not add too much olive oil and honey.
